extendedInfo.description: You can now access more than 600 drawing tutorials in a single location. Â«How to Draw - Art LessonsÂ» is an Android app that combines all of the How to Draw tutorials to offer a single solution to learning how to draw (just about anything) that is super easy, fast, and funâwhenever and wherever you go!â WHAT TO DRAW?We grouped all our drawing lessons in to 25 sections to make it easy for you to choose what to draw. So go ahead and choose, because no matter what you choose to draw, you are guaranteed to achieve your goals. Have fun everyone!âââ 25 Drawing Sections âââÇ Anime Manga Ç Band Logos Ç Birds Ç Bleach Ç Death Note Ç Cats and Kittens Ç Dogs and Puppies Ç Anime Animals Ç Farm Animals Ç Football FIFA Logos Ç Flowers Ç Fruits and Sweets Ç Guns and Pistols Ç Cold Arms Ç League of Legends Champions Ç Basketball NBA Logos Ç Hockey NHL Logos Ç Sea Animals Ç Super Autos I War Tanks Ç Tattoo Flowers Ç Tattoo Skulls Ç Tattoo Tribal Art Ç Toy Machines Ç Wild Animals Ç Zodiak Signs Ç Monsters and Zombies Ç Famous People Ç Famous Politicsâ HOW IS IT EASY?Learning to draw with the Â«How to Draw - Art LessonsÂ» app consists of you following along with each step presented in the tutorial for the subject you want to learn to draw. The number of steps varies, but each one covers a key aspect of the subject. Even complex subjects such as military tanks, sports cars, zodiac signs, and League of Legends characters are a snap!â HOW IS IT FAST?Instead of having to take a lengthy class, you can use the Â«How to Draw - Art LessonsÂ» app to learn to draw. The really good news is that you can learn at your own pace and level. The app includes previous and next buttons so that you can go backwards and forwards through the tutorials so that you can to learn the way you want!â HOW IS IT FUN?The Â«How to Draw - Art LessonsÂ» app is perfect for individuals, parties, classroom activities, and competitions. The app includes a handpicked collection of items of the most popular and fun subjects: cartoon characters, flowers, fruits, toy cars, band logos, animals, guns and pistols are just a few examples. Try one or try them all!â FEATURESThe following is a list of some the features that you can expect to enjoy with the Â«How to Draw - Art LessonsÂ» app:â Integrated rating system that assigns a level of difficulty (Easy, Normal, Hard, and Expert) to each tutorial âchoose your level!â Each tutorial contains 10-30 precise steps!â More than 600 tutorialsâboredom is not an option!Try Â«How to Draw - Art LessonsÂ» today!If you are still here find more information about what you can draw inn different sections of our app:Cats and Kittens - Sonic cats, manga cats, cheshire cat..Dogs and Puppies -  Hallowen Puppy, Christmas Dog, boxer...Wild Animals - Shark, Fish, Monkey, Lion, Penguin...Farm Animals - Horse, Dalmatian, Cow...Sea Animals - Dolphin, Nemo, Cartoon Fish...Anime Manga - characters from Death Note, Bleach, Naruto...Bleach Manga - Ichigo, Rukia, KON... Death Note Manga - Kira, L Lawliet, Ryuk...Wild Birds - Chicken, Eagle, Dove...Band Logos - Metallica, AC/DC, Aerothmith, Linkin Park...Guns and Pistols - Knife, Grenade, AK-47, Colt, Bomb...League of Legends Champions - Alistar, Annie, Caitlyn, Kayle...Football FIFA Logos - Milan, PSG, Chelsea, Barcelona, Bayern...Super Autos - Ford, Bugatti Veyron, Maserati, McLaren, Mercedes-Benz...Basketball NBA Logos - Chicago Bulls, New York Knicks, Los Angeles Lakers...Hockey NHL Logos - LA Kings, NY Islanders, Black Hawks Chicago, Canadiens...Famous People - Selena Gomez, Lady Gaga, Justin Bieber...... and many more!

reviews.title: Okay.
reviews.comment: I give this 3 stars for what it claims it does and actual reality.  It is not as bad as some but it is still not as described. The more complex drawings are not exactly step by step which makes it too difficult for beginners.  However it does have plenty of simple tasks allowing thw user to become proficient enough to attempt the harder drawings.
